20TH CENTURY.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

ALGONQUIN.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a speared pineapple wedge and cherry.

ARCHIBALD\u00e2\u20ac\u2122S LAST MEMORY.Method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

ARMY AND NAVY.Method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

AVIATION.Method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

BEE STING.Method: Combine whiskey and honey in the base of a shaker. Stir until honey dissolves. Add tequila, apple juice, and ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

BEE'S KNEES.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

BEELZEBUB.Method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

BIJOU.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

BLACK SPRING.Method: Combine first three ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with three speared cherries.

BLINKER.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

BOSTON SOUR.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain back into the shaker and discard ice. Dry shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

BOULEVARDIER.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

BOURBON ALEXANDER.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

BOURBON CIDER.Method: Combine first three ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with cider. Garnish with a cherry.

BOURBON LIFT.Method: Combine first four ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Fine strain into a Collins glass. Top with club soda.

BOURBON SMASH.Method: Muddle raspberries in the base of a shaker. Add remaining ingredients to the shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

BRAMBLE.Method: Combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Float crÃ¨me de mure on top of the ice. Garnish with a lemon half-wheel and a fresh blackberry.

BROOKLYN.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

BROWN DERBY.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Fine strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a grapefruit zest twist.

CASINO.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

CLOVER CLUB.Method: Muddle raspberries with simple syrup in the base of a shaker. Combine remaining ingredients in the shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with three speared raspberries.

COCO CHANEL.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

CORPSE REVIVER #2.Method: Rinse a chilled martini or coupe glass with absinthe and set aside. Combine all other ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared martini or coupe glass.

DE LA LOUISIANE #4.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

DIAMONDBACK.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

DIXIE DEW.Method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

Dark and Stormy.Method: Fill a highball glass with ice.  Add rum.  Top with Ginger Beer.  Garnish with a Lime Wedge.

Eclipse.Method: Muddle raspberries in the base of a shaker. Add other ingredients to the shaker with ice. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Garnish with a raspberry and sprig of mint.

El Floridita.Method: Combine ingredients in a blender with 6 oz crushed ice.  Blend.  Pour into martini glass.  Garnish with a cherry.

Enrico Palazzo.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a grapefruit zest twist.

FALCONI.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

Fancy Free.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

GIMLET.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

GIN AND TONIC.Method: Add gin to a highball glass and fill with ice. Top with tonic water. Squeeze lemon or lime wedge over the top and stir.

GIN AND TONIC*.Method: Add gin to a highball glass and fill with ice Top with tonic water

GIN BUCK.Method: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add gin and lemon juice to collins glass. Stir briefly. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a lemon wedge. Variation: substitute lime juice and a lime wedge.

GIN RICKEY.Method: Club soda, to top Filla highball glass with ice Top with club soda

GIN SODA.Method: Prepare exactly as Gin and Tonic, but top with club soda.

Godfather.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

HANKY PANKY.Method: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

Hebridean Shores.Method: Combine first three ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with beer. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

Hobnail.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

Kentucky Buck.Method: Muddle the strawberry in the base of a shaker. Add next four ingredients and ice to the shaker. Shake well. Fine strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lemon wheel and strawberry slice.

LAST WORD.Method: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake. Fine strain into a chilled coupe glass.

LEFT BANK MARTINI (BY SIMON DIFFORD).Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lime zest twist.

LORRAINE.Method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

LYNCHBURG LEMONADE.Method: Combine first three ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled collins glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

MANHATTAN.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

MARTINI.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

MCKINLEY'S DELIGHT.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

Mamie Taylor.Method: Combine first two ingredients in an ice-filled highball glass. Stir briefly. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Morning Glory Fizz.Method: Combine first five ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled collins glass. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lime wheel.

NEGRONI.Method: Combine ingredients in an old-fashioned glass with ice. Stir well. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

NEW YORK SOUR.Method: Combine first four ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Top with red wine carefully poured over the back of a spoon.

New York Sour.Method: Combine first three ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Pour Port on top of the ice over the back of a spoon.

Painkiller.Method: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a snifter filled with pebble ice. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

Pina Colada.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled hurricane glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Presbyterian.Method: Add scotch to a Collins glass. Fill with ice. Top with equal amounts of club soda and ginger ale.

Purple Heather.Method: Combine first two ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Top with club soda.

RAMOS GIN FIZZ.Method: Combine first seven ingredients into a cocktail shaker without ice. Dry shake (no ice) very well for 45-60 seconds. Strain into a chilled collins glass. Top with club soda.

ROCK N' RYE.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

RYE AND POMEGRANATE PUNCH.Method: Combine first four ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with club soda.

Rob Roy.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Rum Caipirinha.Method: Muddle syrup and lime wedges in the base of a shaker. Add rum and ice to the shaker. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Rum Dum.Method: Combine first four ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with Dark rum.

SARATOGA COCKTAIL #1.Method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

SAZERAC.Method: Chill an old-fashioned glass with ice and set aside. Combine first three ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Discard ice in the old-fashioned glass and rinse with absinthe. Strain mixture into the absinthe-rinsed, chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

SHERMAN COCKTAIL.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

SINGAPORE SLING.Method: Club soda, to top Combine first eight ingredients into a shaker Shake Strain into glass Top with club soda Stir lightly and garnish with a speared lemon wheel and cherry.

STONE FENCE.Method: Pour ingredients into an ice-filled pint glass. Lightly stir. Serve with straws.

Scofflaw.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Singapore Sling.Method: Fill a sling glass with ice. Combine first eight ingredients into a shaker. Shake. Strain into glass. Top with club soda. Stir lightly and garnish with a speared lemon wheel and cherry. Serve with a straw.

THIRD DEGREE.Method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice Strain into a chilled coupe glass

TRINIDAD SOUR (BY GIUSEPPE GONZALEZ).Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain to a chilled coupe glass.

The Modern.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

The Orkney Chapel.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

Third Degree.Method: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Unnamed Cocktail.Method: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

WHISKEY SOUR*.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a speared lemon wheel and a cherry.

WHITE LADY.Method: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain back into the same shaker to remove ice. Shake again (dry shake). Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

WITTY COMEBACK.Method: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

Ward Eight.Method: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.
